name: Axross Pte Ltd
headline: AI-driven HVAC control system for improved energy performance
description:
At Axross, we specialize in delivering AI-driven HVAC control systems designed to enhance energy efficiency and reduce operational costs for manufacturers. Our solutions are tailored to meet the stringent requirements of industries, where maintaining precise environmental conditions is critical.

With a team of experts in AI, data science, and industrial systems, Axross is committed to providing reliable, scalable solutions that help manufacturers achieve their energy efficiency goals and support sustainable practices.

founders.name: Yih Lin Teh, Founder
founders.description: Lin is passionate about bringing technology solutions to underserved communities in emerging markets, like Indonesia. She implemented projects from enabling online financial access for MSMEs, to bringing solar technology into rural households. Her background is in econometrics and data analytics. As a Consultant at Dalberg, she advised large corporates, like Asian Development Bank, Coca-Cola and GSMA. She holds an MBA degree from MIT Sloan School of Management.

founders.name: David Chew, Founder
founders.description: Consultant-turned-entrepreneur. First Class Aeronautics grad. Excited about using tech to solve complex problems for the underserved in emerging markets.

# Driving AI-Powered Energy Efficiency
We enable industrial facilities to become smarter, greener, and more efficient, through AI-driven automated HVAC system controls. 
Learn More
Our AI-driven HVAC control solution can unlock transformative benefits for industrial facilities, such as :
Up to 30%​
in realised HVAC energy savings
Lower scope 2 GHG emissions
Proactivelystabilize production environment 
![Energy optimization](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/621247_9169f70aa4f84e1eac31055e77f589d3~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_106,h_105,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/AI%20Model%20\(21\).png)
Improved operational efficiency from automation
Product
#### Our solution enhances HVAC systems by integrating additional layers of control and optimization into existing infrastructure 
![HVAC solution](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/621247_8134cc68d2604419ba6301f7b6854084~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/AI%20Model%20\(11\).png)
##### 02 / BMS System Integration We extract and leverage historical & real-time data from BMS to build a predictive engine for forecasting energy consumption & cooling demand. 
##### 03 / IoT data analytics.  We deploy IoT sensors to gather data on environmental conditions and system performance, facilitating dynamic real-time adjustments.
##### 04 / Automated HVAC controls. We automate HVAC controls to enable faster reactions and deliver the optimal configuration and sequencing of HVAC equipment. 
##### Decision Layer
##### Control Layer
##### Equipment Layer
##### Sensor & IoT Layer
##### 01 / Intelligent optimisation. We utilize machine learning algorithms to improve energy efficiency, while maintaining key environmental requirements (e.g., temperature, humidity, particle counts). 
#### Contact Us :
Discover how we can help your company lower energy consumption and meet sustainability goals

generated_description:
**Axross Pte Ltd: Revolutionizing HVAC with AI**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Singapore, Axross Pte Ltd has injected some much-needed innovation into the HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) space. This startup emerged from the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W22 and is on a mission to drastically improve energy performance for manufacturers through its AI-driven control systems.

**The Problem They Solve:**  
Industries today face the challenge of maintaining precise environmental conditions without incurring sky-high operational costs. Axross directly addresses this by providing a solution that enhances HVAC systems, ensuring they’re not just functional but optimized for energy efficiency.

**What They Offer:**  
At its core, Axross specializes in advanced HVAC control solutions that help facilities become smarter and greener. Their innovative approach utilizes machine learning algorithms and IoT data analytics to achieve extraordinary results, including:
- Up to 30% savings on HVAC energy costs
- Reduction in greenhouse gas emissions (specifically, lower scope 2 emissions)
- Stabilization of production environments

Axross improves existing HVAC setups by layering additional intelligence and automation, which allows for real-time adjustments based on historical and real-time data. Their services include:
1. **Intelligent optimization** of energy use while adhering to crucial environmental parameters.
2. **BMS (Building Management System) integration** that forecasts energy needs.
3. **IoT analytics** for dynamic environmental data evaluation.
4. **Automated HVAC controls** that optimize system performance swiftly.

**The Team and Vision:**  
With a lean but capable team of 10 experts in AI, data science, and industrial systems, Axross is driven by a commitment to scalability and reliability. Alongside Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer from Y Combinator, they're poised to reshape how industries approach energy consumption.

**Why It Matters:**  
In an era where sustainability is no longer just a buzzword but a necessity, Axross stands out by delivering practical, effective solutions that cater to the pressing needs of the manufacturing sector. The amalgamation of AI and HVAC presents a pivotal opportunity to drive forward energy efficiency and sustainable practices.

Check out more about their offerings and get in touch via their [website](https://www.axross.co/). If you’re in manufacturing and looking to cut down energy costs while benefiting the environment, Axross is a name to keep in your sights.
